      • Lane

        public Lane(LaneCallback laneCallback,
            int x,
            int y,
            int numberOfTiles,
            double difficulty)
        Construct a new Lane
        Parameters:
        laneCallback - THe LaneCallback to be used for the Lane
        x - The X co-ordinate of the Lane
        y - The Y co-ordinate of the Lane
        numberOfTiles - The Number of tiles in the lane
        difficulty - The difficulty of the Level
